description: My personal website where you'll find all my recent projects and, also, a little bit of who I am

hero.subheader: Curious fullstack developer who likes to experiment and make designs, code and host it on the web

about.title: About me
about.first-paragraph: My name is Elías Pereyra Gómez. I'm a fullstack web developer. The enthusiasm for the world of the web started in 2015, when I met for the first time the markup languages: HTML and CSS. Later, I was getting deeper into the programming languages, like PHP, Java and JavaScript.
about.second-paragraph: In web development there are many areas, and of the many, fullstack development and UI design fascinate me.
about.subheader: These are the areas that I like to learn:

contact.title: Would you like to work with me?
contact.comment: I'd like to hear your proposals and make an incredible work together
contact.name: Name
